title: The group argues about going to town, and Daisy insists on having fun.
text:
d of the telephone bell out to Gatsby and me as we waited at
the door.

“The master’s body?” roared the butler into the mouthpiece. “I’m
sorry, madame, but we can’t furnish it—it’s far too hot to touch this
noon!”

What he really said was: “Yes … Yes … I’ll see.”

He set down the receiver and came toward us, glistening sli

relations.explanation: Gatsby's house lights are no longer on, marking the end of his extravagant parties. He fires his servants to prevent gossip about Daisy's visits.
Wolfshiem wanted to do something for the people who are now Gatsby's servants.
